column3: ACK. I also thought so too. LGTM.

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merge
Concept ACK.\nI tried to remove it in the deep past: #3380.\n@sipa disagreed at the time, so let's ask again.
@laanwj Heh, I don't even remember anymore.\n\nConcept ACK, the current approach isn't a good way to measure network propagation anyway.
We'd want to do something different (which would also be much more effective and less confusing) after dandelion and/mempool sync is implemented, anyways.

> Concept ACK, the current approach isn't a good way to measure network propagation anyway.

Right, in one direction it is: if a transaction has not been requested by any other node, you can be sure it hasn't propagated. But not the other way around.
